summary: INTERMITTENTLY STEERING WHEEL  WILL LOCK UP IN THE DIRECTION IT'S BEING TURNED, DRIVER HAS TO APPLY BRAKES TO UNLOCK IT.  THE DEALERSHIP INDICATED THAT BECAUSE THE STEERING COLUMN HAS BUSHINGS INSTEAD OF BEARING, THE  BUSHING WEAR OUT, WHICH CAUSE  THE PROBLEM.  PLEASE PROVIDE MORE DETAILS. TS
